Mendokusai
Tartarus

The next big freeroll

01 Feb 2018

Tomorrow my next freeroll starts with Sam, to get under 180lbs. With my hard-earned crypto on the line I am not looking forward to the journey, but I am looking forward to the destination, which is almost certainly the wrong way to look at it. At least he has promised to help me learn how to run properly. One more night of stuffing my face awaits.
© Jonny Spicer
